reviewed_prompt: Design a software module to help users manage their vinyl records collection. The module should allow users to catalog their records, track their listening habits, and discover new music based on their collection. Users should be able to add, edit, and remove records from their collection, as well as search and filter their records based on various criteria. The module should also provide insights into the user's collection, such as most played records, genres distribution, and recommendations for new records to add based on their current collection.
functional_details: Catalog vinyl records with detailed information
Provide recommendations based on the collection
Search and filter records by various criteria
Generate insights and statistics about the collection
user_interaction: Add a new vinyl record to the collection
Edit details of an existing record
Remove a record from the collection
Search and filter records by artist, genre, year, etc.
desired_features: Integration with music databases for automatic record information retrieval
bar_raiser_features: Social features to share collection with friends
Barcode scanning for quick record addition
data_models: **VinylRecord**: `{ id: string, title: string, artist: string, genre: string, year: number, label: string, condition: string, notes: string, coverImage: string }`
**ListeningSession**: `{ id: string, recordId: string, date: date, duration: number, notes: string }`
**User**: `{ id: string, name: string, email: string, preferences: object }`
**Recommendation**: `{ id: string, recordId: string, userId: string, reason: string, date: date }`
